::Hot Rod::

He saw his old 'friend'  Najah and shot a few mini rockets at him.
He wanted Najah to feel the power of his new body.

::Epyon::

He looked for someone to kill.

::DrillBit::

He looked at DarkFate.
"I dont care who we attack as long as someone dies."

::Dollon::

He walks in drunk.
"We get to kill?"

::Demolition::

He sticks with the other War Machines.
